$BNB /USDT IS TARGETING THE 888 ZONE AFTER A SHARP LIQUIDITY SWEEP AND REACTION FROM LOCAL SUPPORT.üí•üî•


After a strong rejection from the upper supply region, $BNB saw a sudden impulsive drop that flushed out late longs and collected liquidity below recent lows. The aggressive bearish candle indicates panic selling, but the immediate bounce from the demand zone around 840‚Äì845 suggests buyers are still active at discounted levels. As long as price holds above this support base, a short-term long opportunity remains valid, with upside potential toward 880‚Äì888 where previous imbalance and resistance are placed. This move would be considered a corrective rebound rather than a full trend reversal unless price reclaims higher structure.


On the flip side, if $BNB fails to sustain above the 848‚Äì850 support zone and shows weakness again, the bounce could turn into a short continuation setup. A rejection from the 865‚Äì870 area would confirm that sellers are still in control, opening the door for another move toward 835 and potentially deeper levels. Until buyers show strong follow-through above resistance, rallies should be treated cautiously and managed as short-term trades.


Volatility remains high; holding above support favors a relief bounce, while rejection near resistance will likely lead to another bearish continuation.

CA is the core token.  CA on $BNB : 0x66Daa21E4A2199f80dBBb6C7e6a4eBB4CA0E46Ce CA on $CRO : 0x444075EA64D69bf5002aE1A7F44642e46f8B56d4

BNB has clearly broken below a major intraday support zone around 880‚Äì870, and the breakdown happened with strong selling momentum. On the 1H chart, price failed multiple times to hold above resistance and then flushed sharply, showing sellers are in control. On the daily chart, BNB is still trading below all major resistance zones, with a weak structure and lower highs intact.
Volume expanded during the drop, confirming this move is driven by real selling, not just a fake sweep. From a broader market view, overall sentiment remains cautious as BTC and large caps struggle to regain strength, keeping pressure on  $BNB. There are no strong bullish catalysts right now, while derivatives data shows late longs getting trapped near the breakdown area ‚Äî supporting continuation to the downside.

Support Zones:
840 ‚Äì 835 (minor intraday support)
800 ‚Äì 780 (strong daily support)
Resistance Zones:
875 ‚Äì 885 (broken support turned resistance)
900 ‚Äì 905 (major rejection zone)
Pullback Zone to Watch:
If $BNB pulls back before continuation, expect sellers to re-enter around:
855 ‚Äì 865 (most likely pullback zone)
875 ‚Äì 885 (strong rejection if tested)
As long as price stays below 885‚Äì900, the short bias remains valid.

Trade with patience and strict risk management. If you‚Äôre not following Token Talk, you‚Äôre definitely missing the real moves.

$BNBWhat‚Äôs up Binance fam, if you look closely at this chart, BNB first flushed hard and trapped late sellers with a sharp bearish impulse. That sell-off didn‚Äôt get follow-through and instead turned into a clean recovery with higher lows and steady buying pressure. Price respected the rising structure and has now pushed back above the key mid-range level, showing strength and continuation intent.
